root.name: Kid Dracula
root.description: Story Galamoth has taken over Kid Dracula's castle and minions! Kid Dracula, son of Dracula, must use his magic and the aide of his servant, Death, to regain his land and underlings. Gameplay Kid Dracula is a action platformer that, for the most part, involves running, jumping and shooting fireballs. Kid Dracula learns various spells along the way that will help in various situations.
